<h3 id="X9578">X(9578)&nbsp;=&nbsp;INSIMILCENTER OF THESE CIRCLES: BEVAN AND 1ST JOHNSON-YFF</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a^2+(b+c)*(2*b+2*c-a))*(a-b+c)*(a+b-c) : :
<br>
<b>
X(9578) = r*X(40)+2*(R+r)*X(1478)
</b>
<p>X(9578) lies on these lines: {1,5}, {2,1420}, {4,1697}, {7,3617}, {8,226}, {9,3436}, {10,57}, {40,1478}, {43,9552}, {46,5270}, {55,5691}, {56,1698}, {65,3679}, {85,668}, {145,5226}, {165,7354}, {200,5794}, {329,5837}, {377,1706}, {405,2078}, {498,3576}, {515,3085}, {516,5229}, {519,3485}, {631,4311}, {942,5790}, {944,6956}, {946,7962}, {956,5705}, {1056,1210}, {1125,3476}, {1319,3624}, {1329,8583}, {1441,4696}, {1454,6763}, {1467,8728}, {1695,9553}, {1699,3057}, {1737,3333}, {1836,7991}, {1935,5264}, {2003,5711}, {2093,5690}, {2099,3632}, {2136,3434}, {2171,4007}, {2475,3882}, {2550,6736}, {2551,7308}, {2647,3961}, {2886,4853}, {3245,4338}, {3256,5687}, {3295,3586}, {3361,5434}, {3419,6765}, {3475,6738}, {3526,5126}, {3584,3612}, {3585,5119}, {3600,3911}, {3621,4323}, {3626,3671}, {3634,4315}, {3649,4668}, {3680,6871}, {3696,7201}, {3698,8581}, {3826,4321}, {3851,7743}, {3854,7320}, {3870,5086}, {4292,5128}, {4293,6684}, {4297,5218}, {4355,5221}, {4385,6358}, {5080,5250}, {5123,5193}, {5175,5853}, {5249,5554}, {5316,8165}, {5432,7987}, {5438,5552}, {5880,8256}, {6734,6762}, {6982,7982}, {7319,8236}</p>
<p>
X(9578) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3485,3947), (3601,3085)<br>
X(9578) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,12,5219), (1,355,5727), (1,5726,12), (1,7951,8227), (1,7989,11), (7,3617,4848), (8,226,3340), (8,5261,226), (10,388,57), (10,4298,1788), (12,5252,1),  (65,5290,4654), (355,495,1), (355,5534,5881), (377,6735,1706), (388,1788,4298), (1056,5818,1210), (1788,4298,57), (3634,4315,7288), (3679,5290,65), (4292,5657,5128), (5252,5726,5219), (5711,9370,2003)<br></p>
